USHERS NEEDED FOR BIG
GAMES
Joe Zoller, chairman of the Coin
mittee of Ushers, made a request
for more freshmen to turn out to
usher at the football games. It has
been customary in the past for this
work to be carried on mainly by
freshmen, and he desires that this
custom be continued. A large part
of the cash necessary to maintain
the various athletic teams is raised
by the attendance at the football
games, and it is thus extremely
necessary for all ushers to be as efficient and also as pleasant as possible. He explained that at the
,three more "big" games on our
schedule, University of Maryland,
Washington and Lee, and St.
John's, an exceptionally large number of ushers would be needed to
handle the crowd, and he expressed
the desire that as many freshmen
as possible should turn out.

USHERS NEEDED FOR BIG
GAMES
Joe Zoller, chairman of the Coin
mittee of Ushers, made a request
for more freshmen to turn out to
usher at the football games. It has
been customary in the past for this
work to be carried on mainly by
freshmen, and he desires that this
custom be continued. A large part
of the cash necessary to maintain
the various athletic teams is raised
by the attendance at the football
games, and it is thus extremely
necessary for all ushers to be as efficient and also as pleasant as possible. He explained that at the
,three more "big" games on our
schedule, University of Maryland,
Washington and Lee, and St.
John's, an exceptionally large number of ushers would be needed to
handle the crowd, and he expressed
the desire that as many freshmen
as possible should turn out.
